BgStdReward: Range: (-inf, 0]',  # Negative of standard deviation which is always non-negative
BgTimeInRangeReward: Range: [0, 1]',  # Fraction of readings within a range
HypoCountReward: Range: (-inf, 0]',  # Negative count of hypoglycemic episodes
HyperCountReward: Range: (-inf, 0]',  # Negative count of hyperglycemic episodes
SevereHypoCountReward: Range: (-inf, 0]',  # Negative count of severe hypoglycemic episodes
CostReward: Range: (-inf, 0]',  # Negative expected cost, cost is negative
InsulinStdReward: Range: (-inf, 0]',  # Negative standard deviation, always non-negative
BgDropPerInsReward: Range: (-inf, inf)',  # Depends on the relative change of bg and action
DataValidityProportionReward: Range: [0, 1]',  # Proportion of valid insulin and cho entries
InsulinAdjustmentSlopeReward: Range: (-inf, inf)',  # Depends on the action and previous bg
ChoStdReward: Range: (-inf, 0]',  # Negative standard deviation, always non-negative
TimeInRangeCostRatioReward: Range: [0, inf)',  # Ratio of time in range to cost, cost is negative
ConcurrentBgInsulinIncPenalty: Range: (-inf, 0]',  # Negative value for the penalty
ChoDropBgHighPenalty: Range: (-inf, 0]',  # Negative value for the penalty
RapidBgRisePenalty: Range: (-inf, 0]',  # Negative value for the penalty
BgStdPenalty: Range: (-inf, 0]',  # Negative standard deviation, always non-negative
InsulinIncCostDecPenalty: Range: (-inf, 0]',  # Negative value for the penalty
InsulinDropBgHighPenalty: Range: (-inf, 0]',  # Negative value for the penalty
ChoDropBgRisePenalty: Range: (-inf, 0]',  # Negative value for the penalty
CostSpikeNoChangePenalty: Range: (-inf, 0]',  # Negative value for the penalty
